import React from 'react'; import { Component } from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { reduxForm, Field } from 'redux-form'; import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom'; import { editProgram } from '../../../../redux/actions/programA.js'; import { required, minimum, twoHundred } from '../../../utilitarian/validations.js'; class Edit extends Component { handleSubmit = formValues => { let programE = { id: this.props.program.id, name: formValues.name, levelEducation: formValues.levelEducation, institution: formValues.institution, academicCredits: formValues.academicCredits, duration: formValues.duration, methodology: formValues.methodology, requestData: null } this.props.editProgram(localStorage.getItem('Token'), programE); } render() { return (
EDITAR PROGRAMA
) } } const generarInput = ({ input, placeholder, label, type, meta: { touched, warning, error } }) => (
{touched && ((error && {error}) || (warning && {warning}))}
) function mapStateToProps(state) { return { program: state.program.programR, initialValues: { name: state.program.programR.name, levelEducation: state.program.programR.levelEducation, institution: state.program.programR.institution, academicCredits: state.program.programR.academicCredits, duration: state.program.programR.duration, methodology: state.program.programR.methodology } } } let formEdit = reduxForm({ form: 'editProgram', enableReinitialize: true })(Edit) export default withRouter(connect(mapStateToProps, { editProgram })(formEdit));
